subject: Writing
title: Maya Angelou: Voice of Courage
description: Learn Maya Angelou: Voice of Courage in one minute.

hook.text: After childhood trauma, Maya Angelou stopped speaking for five years. Then she found her voice in writing.

buildup.text: I Know Why the Caged Bird Sings, published in 1969, broke taboos about race, abuse, and resilience.

discovery.text: Angelou was the first Black woman to write a nonfiction bestseller in America.

twist.text: She became the first poet to read at a presidential inauguration since Robert Frost in 1961.

climax.text: Her poem 'On the Pulse of Morning' called a divided nation toward hope â€” millions watched live.

punchline.text: Silence made her voice the loudest in the room.
